CustomField.description:
ITEM and ITEM_LINE combination must be unique for a particular business unit and customer combination in the file.
ITEM_LINE will default to 0 if value is not provided.
CustomField.formula: IF(OR((MONTH(TODAY())<7) && (VALUE( Case_Issue__r.Fiscal_Year__c ))<(YEAR(TODAY())-2),(MONTH(TODAY())>6) && (VALUE( Case_Issue__r.Fiscal_Year__c ))<=(YEAR(TODAY())-2)), (CASE ( Case_Issue__r.Accounting_Modification__c, "4172220", CASE( Entry_Reason__c , "ERROR", 8, "MISC", 8, "APEAL", 8, "RCLAS", 8, "INCRS", 8, "DECRS", 8, "CONTG", 7, 8), CASE( Entry_Reason__c , "ERROR", 3, "MISC", 3, "APEAL", 3, "RCLAS", 3, "INCRS", 3, "DECRS", 3, "CONTG", 2, 3))), (CASE ( Case_Issue__r.Accounting_Modification__c, "4172220", CASE( Entry_Reason__c , "ERROR", 6, "MISC", 6, "APEAL", 6, "RCLAS", 6, "INCRS", 6, "DECRS", 6, "CONTG", 7, "PMT-UA", 7, "PMT", 6, 8), CASE( Entry_Reason__c ,"ERROR", 1, "MISC", 1, "APEAL", 1, "RCLAS", 1, "INCRS", 1, "DECRS", 1, "CONTG", 2, "PMT-UA", 2, "PMT",1, 3))))
CustomField.label: Item_Line
